name: oddt
description: Scoring of protein-ligand complexes using ODDT
arguments: mkdir -p /tmp-out && oddt_cli $(inputs.small_molecule.filepath) --receptor $(inputs.protein.filepath) --score rfscore_v1 --score rfscore_v2 --score rfscore_v3 --score nnscore -O /tmp-out/$(inputs.protein.basename)_$(inputs.small_molecule.basename)_scored.$(inputs.small_molecule.ext) && cd /tmp-out && /app/aggregate_score.sh && cp /tmp-out/* /outputs
